name: Wild Animal Hunting Game: Dragon,Wolf,Eagle Hunter
name_original: Wild Animal Hunting Game: Dragon,Wolf,Eagle Hunter
description:
Grab your sniper rifle and feel what it is like to be part of the true to life hunting grounds in the Jungle Sniper Hunting 3D. Engage in death defying hunts in volatile jungles, filled with aggressive and wild beasts hungry for some fresh meat. If you have the eye of the true hunter, only then you can anticipate attacks from every corner and take the shots to score hunt points, on route to becoming the best sniper shooter in the region.

Good collection of wild or feral animals for sport hunting for food and recreation. Only lawfully allowed animals to hunt. Hunt and earn more to unlock next wild levels. We treat hunting as sport, not a wild killing spree of animals. Hunt feral animals but not the Endangered ones.

Shooting a moving object is always difficult than shoot a fix object. Improve your sniper shooting skills to hunt dangerous animals like lions and tigers. They become more fury and aggressive when they hear gun fire and blast sound. They can attack on you and you have to kill them before they reach to you. Kill and shoot before you are killed.

Game Features:
> Engaging sniper hunting experience in realistic deep dark jungles
> Superior sniper shooting controls optimized for mobile and tablet devices
> Realistic Deer Hunter Environment
> Different beasts to hunt down
> Included birds hunting missions
> Different Seasons
> Sniper and Assault Weapons

For lion hunting African lion safari parks are best place. Each level of this hunting games provide new environment and new place. This is very unique animal shooting games then other jungle hunting games. This is one the best top free hunting games. You have hunt lot of wild animals in this game. Sniper riffle and assault rifle are very accurate in aim and target. Sniper provides 99.9% accurate shoot. Use sniper rifle to kill deer and heavy rifle to shoot and kill big cats like lion tigers and bears. You have to accomplish your mission within given time.

How to Play
1. You are presented with mission, clear it to play the next level.
2. Swipe in left center of screen. take aim, zoom, shoot at target.
3. navigate in forest on swiping on left center of your phone.
4. Keep eye on time.
